q: What is Adobe XD primarily used for?
o: User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX) design and prototyping

q: What is the key difference between Adobe XD and Photoshop for UI design?
o: XD is vector-based and focused on interaction/prototyping; Photoshop is raster-based and focused on image editing

q: What is an 'Artboard' in Adobe XD?
o: The canvas area where you design individual screens or pages

q: Which tool is used to select and move objects? (Shortcut V)
Shortcut Short key for Rectangle Tool?
Which key do you hold to Pan the view (Hand tool temporarily)?
What are the three main modes in Adobe XD interface?
Where is the Property Inspector located?
What allows you to duplicate a group of elements multiple times in a grid?
How do you adjust padding between items in a Repeat Grid?
o: Hover over the gap between items and drag the pink interactive areas

q: How to ungroup a Repeat Grid to edit items individually?
o: Cmd + Shift + G or click 'Ungroup Grid' in property inspector
Automatically predicts constraints/pinning for objects when you resize a group/artboard
Combines selected shapes into one single shape
Removes the top shape area from the bottom shape
A reusable element where changing the Main Component updates all Instances
Define variations like 'Hover', 'Pressed', or 'Toggle' within a single component

q: How to create a drop shadow?
o: Check the 'Drop Shadow' box in the Property Inspector
Blurs everything visible *behind* the selected object (Glassmorphism effect)

q: To mask an image with a shape, shortcut?
o: Select both -> Cmd + Shift + M (Mask with Shape)

q: How to import an image into a shape (Like a circle profile pic)?
o: Drag and drop the image file directly from Finder/Explorer ONTO the circle shape
Copy paste image next to circle

q: What panel stores Colors, Character Styles, and Components?
How to add a color to Assets?
o: Select object with color, click '+' in Colors section of Assets panel

q: What happens if you edit a Color in the Assets panel?
o: It updates everywhere that color is applied in the document
Font family, size, weight, spacing, color

q: What is the 'Viewport Height' dotted line on an Artboard?
o: The fold line; content below this line requires scrolling

q: Can you preview on a mobile device?
o: Yes, using the Adobe XD mobile app via USB or Cloud Doc
Cloud autosaves and allows coediting; Local is a .xd file on disk
Multiple designers working on the same Cloud Document simultaneously (Live)

q: How to export assets to PNG?
o: Select objects -> Cmd + E -> Choose format PNG
Choose 'Designed at 1x' in export settings, it generates all scales
Third-party extension to add functionality (e.g. icons, dummy data)
A pre-designed set of components/screens (e.g. Apple iOS kit) to speed up design

q: Which tool draws a straight line?
How to constrain proportion when resizing an object?
o: Hold Shift while dragging corner handle

q: How to resize an object from its center?
Pen Tool: How to create a curved path?
o: Click and Drag to pull out bezier handles

q: Pen Tool: How to close a path?
How to measure distance between two objects?
o: Select one, hold Option/Alt, and hover over the other

q: Zoom Tool: Shortcut to Zoom In?
Zoom Tool: Shortcut to Zoom Out?
Shortcut to Fit All Artboards in View?

o: Columns are for responsive web layout; Square is for precise UI alignment

q: Can you Copy CSS code from XD?
o: Yes, right click object > Copy Code > CSS (or use plugins)

q: How to make a shape a specific size?
o: Type width (W) and height (H) in the Property Inspector
Drag handles until it looks right
Round the corners of a rectangle (Square to Circle)
Setting different radius values for each of the 4 corners
Fill is the interior color; Border is the outline stroke
Sampling (picking) a color from anywhere on screen
Linear changes color along a line; Radial radiates from a center point
Paragraph spacing is gap between blocks of text; Line spacing is gap between lines within block
Click icon in Property Inspector (Shift + Cmd + H is rare/menu)
Adjusts the depth of the star points (< 100% makes a star)

q: Selecting objects: Shift click vs Cmd click?
o: Shift click adds to selection; Cmd click selects deep (nested object)
Move cursor near corner handle until rotate icon appears, then drag
Option + Cmd + V (Mac) / Alt + Ctrl + V (Win)

q: What allows creating a scrollable area inside a specific frame?

o: Auto-adjusting space/order when items are added/removed (Like Auto Layout)
Space between the group background and its content

q: Quick Export button (Property Inspector) exports as?
o: The format selected in previous export or default
30 days (or 60 depending on plan) unless named/bookmarked
Entering their Adobe ID email address
Assets from current document AND linked Creative Cloud Libraries

q: Text Area: Point Text vs Area Text?
o: Point text expands horizontally as you type; Area text wraps within a fixed box width
Yes, built-in spell check enabled in Help menu

q: Guides: How to create smart guides?
o: Smart guides appear automatically when moving objects to show alignment
Right click image -> Edit in Photoshop (Updates original image in XD after save)
Right click > Copy SVG Code (Great for pasting into code editors)
Pastes only the prototype wires/interactions to selected object (Cmd+Opt+V in Prototype mode)

q: What is the small Home icon on an Artboard title?
o: Sets the 'Home' artboard (Starting screen of the prototype flow)

q: Selecting an Artboard vs selecting content?
o: Click the Artboard Title to select the artboard itself

q: How to make a responsive layout where multiple items shuffle?
How to fix an element to the screen during scroll (Sticky)?
o: Check 'Fix position when scrolling' in Property Inspector

q: Does Adobe XD support video playback?
o: Yes, you can import MP4 and set playback triggers (Tap, Auto)

q: What is a 'Lottie' animation in XD?
o: JSON-based vector animation (imported from AE) that plays natively

q: Can you use Audio as a trigger or action?
o: Yes, Audio Playback action (play sound) or Voice Trigger (speak to interact)
Triggering a transition by speaking a specific command phrase
Allows rotating layer planes in 3D space (X, Y, Z rotation)

q: What is the difference between Grid View and Reference Guide?
o: Grid View covers the artboard (Square/Columns); Reference Guides are dragged from the ruler
The empty space on the left and right edges of the artboard

q: What is the default square size for the Square Grid?
Can you turn off grids for specific artboards only?
o: Yes, select the artboard and uncheck 'Grid' in Property Inspector
Click the canvas background and press Cmd + A (or just Cmd+A depending on focus)

q: How to rename an artboard quickly?
o: Double click the Artboard Title in the workspace or Layers panel
Hold Option/Alt and drag the Artboard Title

q: Difference between clicking Artboard Title and delete vs clicking content and delete?
o: Title deletes the whole artboard; Content deletes only layers inside

q: How to select a nested object inside a group without ungrouping?
Does XD have a dedicated Direct Selection Tool (White Arrow) like Illustrator?
o: No, it uses the Select Tool (V) combined with double-clicking or Cmd-clicking

q: How to modify a path (vector shape) points?
o: Double click the shape to enter Pixel/Path edit mode

q: What does 'Align to Pixel Grid' do?
o: Snaps vector points to full pixels to avoid blurry edges on export
How the artwork will look when rasterized (pixelated view @ 100%)

q: Does XD support Hex codes with transparency (8 digit)?
How to rename a Color Asset?
o: Double click the color swatch name in Assets Panel (Switch to List View)

q: Deleting an asset (Color/Style) from the panel...?
o: Removes it from the list but keeps the appearance on objects on canvas (breaks the link)
Right click asset > Highlight on Canvas (Selects all objects using that asset)
Right click object > Reveal (Scrolls to and highlights the used component/color in the panel)

q: Text: How to convert Point Text to Area Text?
o: Select text object, options in Property Inspector (Text Area vs Point Text icon)
Click 'TT' icon in Property Inspector (Double click selects word)

o: Check 'Mark for Export' icon in Property Inspector (or Shift + Cmd + E ? No, shortcut is just E in layers panel sometimes)

Usually PNG, JPG, or SVG (@1x and @2x)

q: How to find Main Component from an Instance?
o: Right click instance > Edit Main Component
Right click > Reset to Main State

q: What overrides are possible in Instances?
o: Text content, Image fill, Opacity, Visibility, etc.

q: How to detach an instance (break link)?
o: Right click > Ungroup Component (Shift + Cmd + G)
Drag a component from Assets panel onto an instance on canvas to replace it
Click the Grey Home icon next to artboard title (turns Blue)
The flow/interaction from one object/artboard to another

q: How to remove a prototype wire?
o: Drag the destination end of the wire into empty space

q: When you update a design, how to update the link?
o: Share Mode > Update Link (keeps the same URL)
Manage Published Links option opens website to delete/modify old links
Reviewers can pin a comment to a specific spot on the design
Allows people without Adobe ID to comment (if enabled)
Fills shapes with random avatar photos
Exports artboards to Zeplin for developer handoff

q: How long is Version History retained for Cloud Docs on non-Enterprise plans?
o: 30 days (versions older than that are deleted unless named)

q: Offline Editing behavior for Cloud Docs?
o: You can edit offline if the doc was opened previously; changes sync when back online

q: What happens if a conflict occurs during sync (two users editing same object offline)?
o: XD creates a 'Conflicting Copy' file to preserve both versions

q: Difference between 'Document Assets' and 'Creative Cloud Libraries'?
o: Document Assets are local to the file; CC Libraries are shared across apps (Ps, Ai, XD) and teams

q: How to link an asset from a CC Library?
o: Drag it from the Libraries panel onto the canvas (creates a linked instance)

q: What does the Green Link icon on a component mean?
o: It is a Linked Component from an external document or library

q: How to update a Linked Component that has changed in the source?
o: Click the blue 'Update' icon in the Assets panel next to the component
Prevents the element from resizing when its parent group/component is resized
Yes, enabling 'Padding' in layout allows the background to resize automatically with text content
Depth (moving objects closer or further away)
You can animate 3D rotation/position between artboards using Auto Animate
Multiplies the color values (darkens), whites become transparent
Object Blur affects the object itself; Background Blur affects what's BEHIND the object

q: Requirement for Background Blur to work?
o: The blurring object (e.g. rectangle) must have some transparency (Fill Opacity < 100%)
ldpi, mdpi, hdpi, xhdpi, xxhdpi, xxxhdpi (scaled versions)
Presentation Atts puts styles in tags (fill='red'); Internal CSS puts them in <style> block
Removes whitespace/comments to reduce file size (harder to read for humans)
Keeps only the overlapping area of selected shapes

q: Standard shapes available in Polygon tool?
o: Triangle (3 sides) by default, can type 4 (Diamond), 5 (Pentagon), etc.

q: Can you edit polygon side count after drawing?
o: Yes, select object and change 'Sides' in Property Inspector

q: How to round corners of a Polygon?
o: Drag the corner widgets inside the points or use Corner Radius input

q: Can you round only ONE specific vertex of a path?
o: Yes, double click to edit path, select the node, double click node (or use Convert to Curve)

q: Does XD have native 'Text on Path'?
o: No, you must use plugins or import from Illustrator
Yes, based on system settings or text language settings

o: Yes (e.g. Tap to Navigate + Drag to Scroll, or Tap + Voice)

q: Can you nest components inside other components?
o: Yes, allowing for complex Atomic Design structures (e.g. icon inside button inside card)

q: How do Overrides work with Nested Components?
o: You can override properties of the nested instance, and those overrides persist even if the outer component is updated (unless the override matches the update)

q: Can you Swap a Component instance that is nested inside another component?
o: Yes, enabling flexible systems (e.g. swapping an icon instance inside a button component)

q: Does XD have a 'Push Overrides to Main' feature like Figma?
o: No, you must manually edit the Main Component to match the changes (or Copy/Paste Appearance)

q: How to reset overrides on a nested component only?
o: Select the nested instance > Right Click > Reset to Main State
Allows the component to automatically resize/reflow when content (like text length) changes
Ensures the background container (e.g. button shape) expands with the text label

q: Can you use Repeat Grid inside a Component?
o: Yes, but resizing the component might not resize the grid cells unless configured carefully

q: Can you use Scroll Groups inside a Component?
o: Yes, useful for reusable map widgets or carousels
Desktop software interactions (e.g. Cmd+S to save in a prototype of an app)
Supports standard controller inputs (A, B, X, Y, Triggers) mapped to interaction triggers
You type the exact phrase the prototype should listen for
Limited control over pitch/speed/emotion; uses system default voices

q: Audio Playback: Can you tick a 'Loop' checkbox?
o: No, XD native audio action does not have a loop setting (needs workaround or Lottie)
Layers must have the EXACT same name and group hierarchy in both artboards to animate
Objects must reside in the same type of container (Artboard -> Group -> Object) to match

q: Debugging Auto-Animate: Why is it cross-fading instead of moving?
o: XD doesn't recognize the objects as the same (check names and layer hierarchy)

q: Sharing: Updating vs Creating New Link?
o: Update Link preserves comments and the URL; New Link generates a fresh URL and wipes comments

q: Sharing: Can you create a redirect to a new link?

o: Only specific Adobe IDs added via email can view the link
Colors and Character Styles in Assets Panel act as basic design tokens

q: CC Libraries: Sharing with a team?
o: You invite team members to the specific Library in the Creative Cloud app/web
Edit allows modifying assets in the library; View only allows using them
When a library updates, a blue dot appears; you can Preview and Accept changes to update your doc

q: Is there a 'Color Burn' blend mode in XD?
o: Yes, used to darken base color to reflect blend color
Yes, subtracts either the blend color from the base color or vice versa
Yes, similar to Difference but lower contrast
Yes, applies the hue of the blend color to the base image
Yes, applies the saturation of the blend color
Yes, combines Hue and Saturation of blend color with Luminosity of base (Tinting)
Yes, creates a result with the hue and saturation of the base color and the luminosity of the blend color
